mapper.select: select id as rankId, total_diamond as totalDiamond, total_calculate as totalCalculate, total_civilize_calculate as totalCivilizeCalculate, total_task_calculate as totalTaskCalculate, rank_time as rankTime, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from rank where rank_time BETWEEN #{rankTimeStartStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{rankTimeEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by id desc
mapper.delete: delete from rank where rank_time BETWEEN #{rankTimeStartStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{rankTimeEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
